title: "I Lost My Best Friend" | Good Omens | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video UK
comment: "Shut up Anderson, you're lowering the IQ of the entire street"
I love that Aziraphale is clearly touched when Crowley said “I lost my best friend” but says “I’m sorry to hear that” in case he was talking about someone else.

"demons can..."
and just like that aziraphale finally came to grips with how little the difference between crowley and himself really is

"You're not a demon, you're an angel."


Aziraphale be like "eh, same thing."

Crowley was depressed until he saw his bff again

If that isn't love, i don't know what it is
description:
Is Aziraphale dead? We're not sure and neither is he. But there's always time for a quick drink.
